from t_channel c left join t_device d on d.id = c.dev_id left join t_org o on o.id = c.logic_org_id left join t_code tc on tc.id = c.ch_type and tc.type_id = c.type_id

mapper.select: select concat(a.id) id, a.dev_type devType, case when b.mac is null or b.mac ='' then CONCAT(b.outer_id,'/',b.imei) else substring_index(b.mac,'_', -1) end mac, b.online, concat(a.addr) addr, a.del_flag allWarn, 1 meter, a.firmware_version firmwareVersion, c.name gateway, d.bus_addr busAddr, CONCAT('/static_modules/device/',tc.icon_skin) iconSkin, (SELECT count(*) from t_channel where dev_id =a.id and ch_type = 201 and type_id = 4) allCount, (SELECT count(*) from t_channel where dev_id =a.id and ch_type = 201 and type_id = 4 and channel_type is not null) useCount from t_device a LEFT JOIN t_code tc on tc.id = a.dev_type and tc.type_id = a.type_id left join t_device_detail b on a.id = b.id left join t_device c on c.id = a.parent_id left join t_device_detail d on d.id = a.id where a.org_id = #{orgId} and a.dev_type in (162,168,169,170,171,172,174,183,185,186,225)
